description: Elizabeth is one of the toughest whores that I've ever met. She genuinely loves pain, and as the day goes on you can see it in her expressions. This is some of the most intense impact play that you will see. She pleads for more, and she suffers through every second of pain that I inflict upon her. Breath play is one thing that get's this slut dripping wet, so I give her more than she can handle, inside and out.
title: Cruel and Unusual Punishment
